About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Uma Maheswari is having overall 5+ years of experience. She working as Master trainer in EDUNET Foundation specialized in Full Stack Web Development, Microsoft Azure, and was previously a Web Designing Trainer and handled Tata strive and Bank of America Project having trained youths. Also, Full stack Developer in Brain I Valley, as Tech Support Engineer in Microsoft Process, and a second-grade level senior executive with Dell. From Tata Strive received an achievement certificate for a program that comprised sessions on methodology, process, and pedagogy. In Recognized NGO, acknowledged with best performer award for thinking out of box. She has completed her B.E Computer Science from Alpha College of Engineering, Chennai, and is pursuing an MBA in Business Analyst at SRM University. She is passionate about her work and is a confident woman who inspires youths to learn new things easily and understandable.
